review: Love it so far.  A little delay from computer, but allows me to stream pictures, videos, etc. to my television from many devices
author: S. Smith

review: Nice streaming device for applications that support it, just wish there were more applications.  Setup is very easy.
author: DC

review: Worked perfectly and arrived very promptly.  Seriously, this is the best tool for the TV I've run across in a long time.
author: Trish Dill

review: Love it.Getting a amazon fire tv stick to see how they compare, will update after I get the fire stick.
author: Dustin Z

review: So chromecast has an issue with Netflix that neither Netflix of google want to resolve. I don't know if its cause I'm using an apple device but I'm returning this s****y product because it only streams YouTube and thts just unacceptable forme
author: Logan Vetters

review: Great item to stream video, show pictures or display desktop on your big screen television.
author: Jeff Laskowski "j666laz"

review: I had been contemplating getting this thing for a while and now I wonder what the heck was I waiting for. I love the ability to stream the contents of my tablet or phone  on my TV.
author: Donnie

review: Set up was pretty easy. You had to download an app to your phone/tablet, or use a computer. What I failed to understand from the description (I have to admit, I bought on the recommendation of a friend, and didn't spend a lot of time reading the information), is that you have to use a phone/tablet/computer to control the device. This is not a plug-and-play that allows you to go to a netflix app on your tv. You are, for example, going to the netflix app on your phone, but through this device, broadcasting it onto your tv.Since I intended to use this in a guest room, this was not a reasonable option, so it went back. It does work as intended, though.
author: Candace L Kludt
